description:
The school is deserted, and the trees are bare. The second semester has ended, and the students of Asahigaoka Branch School are preparing for the New Year. The Koshigayas are cleaning house, the Ichijous are preparing osechi, and the Miyauchis are making New Year`s soba. Late at night, Kaede joins the Miyauchi sisters to go out and watch the first sunrise of the year...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: We Watched the First Sunrise of the Year
Wir haben uns den ersten Sonnenaufgang des Jahres angesehen
